contest-event.event-date:
June 7, 2015 D West Lothian Festival of Brass
West Lothian Festival of Brass 0 Entertainments Contest West Lothian Challenge west-lothian-challenge
Howden Park Centre, Livingston, West Lothian, Scotland, UK Best new composition or arrangement: One More Day (Claude-Michel Schönberg arr Andrew Duncan), played by Co-operative Funeralcare
Best section/ensemble: One More Day (Claude-Michel Schönberg arr Andrew Duncan), played by Co-operative Funeralcare
Best soloist: Jim Hayes (cornet, Co-operative Funeralcare) (playing Cry Me A River (Arthur Hamilton arr Alan Morrison))
Most entertaining performance: Co-operative Funeralcare
Best performance of an Elgar Howarth composition or arrangement: Paris le Soir (Elgar Howarth), played by Kirkintilloch
June 7, 2015, 10:45 p.m. Aug. 19, 2015, 4:17 p.m.
1 Whitburn Band John Boax
2 Cooperation Band Andrew Duncan
3 Clackmannan and District Band Lynda Nicholson
4 Kirkintilloch Band Raymond Tennant
5 Kingdom Brass Eoin Tonner
6 Kirkintilloch Kelvin Brass Charles Keenan
